    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • createSubscription

        public WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> createSubscription(Long accountId,
                                                       Long planId,
                                                       String promoCode)
                                                         throws SirqulException
        Create a subscription for a billable entity. Provide a planId, if not provided then the base plan will be assigned.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the create, must be the responsible manager
        planId - The plan to subscribe to, if null use default plan
        promoCode - Set a promo code for a discount.
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • deleteSubscription

        public SirqulResponse deleteSubscription(Long accountId)
                                  throws SirqulException
        Suspend the current subscription for the billable entity managed by the account. The account must be the responsible manager to perform this action.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must be the responsible manager
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getSubscription

        public WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> getSubscription(Long accountId)
                                                      throws SirqulException
        Use the accountId to determine the associated BillableEntity. Then get the subscription.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the lookup
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getSubscriptionPlan

        public WrappedResponse<SubscriptionPlanResponse> getSubscriptionPlan(Long planId)
                                                              throws SirqulException
        Get the matched subscription plan.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/plan/list
        Parameters:
        planId - The ID of the plan to get
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<SubscriptionPlanResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getSubscriptionPlans

        public WrappedResponse<List<SubscriptionPlanResponse>> getSubscriptionPlans(Boolean visible,
                                                                   String role)
                                                                     throws SirqulException
        Get the list of available subscription plans. Plans are a default set of subscription options.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/plan/list
        Parameters:
        visible - Include visible only (true), hidden only (false), or all (null)
        role - The role the plan is targeted for, values are: DEVELOPER, RETAILER, ADVERTISER
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<List< SubscriptionPlanResponse>>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getSubscriptionUsage

        public WrappedResponse<ApplicationUsageResponse> getSubscriptionUsage(Long accountId,
                                                             Long applicationId,
                                                             Long start,
                                                             Long end)
                                                               throws SirqulException
        Use the accountId to determine the associated BillableEntity. Then get the application usage.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/usage/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the lookup
        applicationId - Get for just 1 application instead of the BillableEntity
        start - The start time frame
        end - The end time frame
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<ApplicationUsageResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateSubscription

        public WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> updateSubscription(Long accountId,
                                                       Long planId,
                                                       String promoCode,
                                                       Boolean active)
                                                         throws SirqulException
        Updates the subscription for the billable entity for an account.

        Target API Endpoint: /subscription/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the update, must be the responsible manager
        planId - The plan to subscribe to
        promoCode - Set a promo code for a discount.
        active - Set active status
        Returns:
        a WrappedResponse<SubscriptionResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
